title: gHD
seo_title: gHD | WestHouse Hotel New York Partners
seo_description: One of the world’s premier hair styling specialists, gHD, or Good Hair Day, is revered internationally for its hair straightening irons (or flat irons). With a keen eye on glamour, fashion and flair, the company was the first hair tool sponsor of the Victoria’s Secret Fashion Show, and is favored by celebrities such as A-list celebrities. Residents staying at WestHouse will appreciate the high-tech hair care tools provided in every bedroom and suite.
shortdescrp: Look your best with Good Hair Day tools
